title: Race Organizer Receives Three-Month Suspended Sentence after Death of Stef Loos
content:
Organizer of GP Alfred Gadenne Marc Duquesnoy convicted after young Belgian rider died in collision with vehicle at 2019 race.

Read the full article at Race Organizer Receives Three-Month Suspended Sentence after Death of Stef Loos on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
